description:
Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy - and a train!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Otoko no Saigo! Umi Ressha ga Naita Hi
La fin d’un homme légendaire ! Le jour où le train des mers a pleuré
The End of the Legendary Man! The Day the Sea Train Cried!
Смерть человека-легенды! День, когда морепоезд рыдал
نهاية الرّجل الأسطوريّ! اليوم الّذي بكى فيه قطار البحر!
伝説の男の最後! 海列車が泣いた日
